title: Medieval town beneath the historic Czech Republic city reveals ancient life
description: The three-year excavation brought to the surface an old settlement at the historic center of Třebíč, a town in the Vysočina Region of the Czech Republic.

title: High schooler discovers 150-million-year-old dinosaur fossil on first day of dig
description: Aidan Connor, a senior at Cheshire Academy in New Haven County, found the ancient bone in Red Lodge, Montana, this summer, according to a news release from the academy.

title: Xinhua Silk Road: Conference highlights ancient port site of Maritime Silk Road held in Wenzhou, E. China

title: Sarazm Tajikistan: Ancient Bronze-Age City & Proto-Urban Heritage in Zarafshan Valley
description: Sarazm Tajikistan: Ancient Bronze-Age City & Proto-Urban Heritage in Zarafshan ValleySarazm in Tajikistan reveals a five-thousand-year-old proto-urban settlement — a must-visit for lovers of archaeology, early civilization history and cultural heritage.The post Sarazm Tajikistan: Ancient Bronze-Age City & Proto-Urban Heritage in Zarafshan Valley appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
